bone Pr 17:22 (coll.) Pr 25:15; of behemoth (hippopot.) Job 40:18 (‖[[עחם]] q.v.)
strength Ge 49:14 [[חֲמׂר גׇּ֑רֶם]] strong ass (lit. bony, so VB).
